author: cnbc.com
title: Anexinet Acquires Propelics to Accelerate Digital Capabilities
text:
PHILADELPHIA, Feb. 21, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anexinet Corporation , a leading provider of digital business solutions, today announced that the company has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Propelics . The acquisition will enable Anexinet to accelerate its digital capabilities with the addition of Propelics’ enterprise mobile solutions.
Established in 2011, Propelics is a thought leader in enterprise mobility. The company's proven methodology fast-tracks enterprise customers for mobile success by helping them develop mobile strategies, tackle new technologies, and build beautiful, intuitive mobile applications that simplify business processes and enable more engaging and productive mobile interaction.
“Propelics has been focused on solving the critical needs of organizations to drive more intelligent engagement with their key stakeholders by utilizing advanced mobile applications to deliver measurable improvement in employee productivity, customer satisfaction, and revenue growth,” said Brad Hokamp, CEO, Anexinet. “By combining Anexinet’s digital and analytics capabilities with Propelics’ enterprise mobility solutions, we can now offer our customers a more comprehensive and compelling platform to enable their digital business transformation.”
“We have been focused on the high growth enterprise mobility market, and we recognized that our customers’ digital business needs were also expanding more broadly into emerging technologies, consumer omni-channel engagement, as well as the cloud and advanced analytics,” said Adam Bookman, Co-founder and Partner at Propelics. “We merged with Anexinet to help us address our clients’ growing digital business transformation requirements.”
To learn more about Anexinet, follow us on Twitter , LinkedIn , Facebook or via the Anexinet Insights Blog .
About Anexinet
Anexinet ( www.anexinet.com ) specializes in helping companies design, build, and run their digital applications and platforms. For 20 years, Anexinet has delivered intelligent insights, customer engagement and enterprise modernization solutions that drive impactful business outcomes. Partner with Anexinet to be your Digital Architects, so you can focus on your core business.
